Title: Save My Soul
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Russo, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Suspicious of where her true loyalties lie, Klaus invites Freya to the compound in order to gain more insight into her past with Dahlia. After a series of strange visions,Rebekah begins to ...
